titleStmt.title: The cleansing of the ten lepers, or, Briefe notes on Luke 17, vers. 14, 15, 16, 17, 18 by Mathevv Caylie minister of Gods Word at Maidford in Northamptonsh.
titleStmt.author: Caylie, Mathew.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.L. for William Sheffard, and are to be sold at his shop, at the entring in of Popes head Allie out Lumbard-streete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
